General.Name: Wondershare Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Wondershare Technology Group Co., Ltd. develops application software products in China and internationally. The company offers video creative software, such as Wondershare Miaoying, UniConverter, Recording, etc.; Wondershare Filmstock, Miaoku video creative material platform and Aihua; AIGC applications, such as Bobo; drawing creative software, including Edraw Icon, Edraw Brain Map, and Ink Knife; document creative software, such as Wondershare PDF and PDFelement; and Recoverit, Data Manager, Easy Repair, and Mobile Manager for utilities solutions. The company's applications are used in desktop, mobile, and online terminal. The company was formerly known as Wondershare Technology Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Wondershare Technology Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building 5, Software Industry Base, Shenzhen, China, 518057
